title: NACC Uniform Data Set (UDS) - FOLLOW-UP Form B7: FUNCTIONAL ASSESSMENT - FUNCTIONAL ACTIVITIES SCALE (FAS[1])
description: INSTRUCTIONS: This form is to be completed by the clinician or other trained health professional, based on information provided by the co-participant. For further information, see UDS Coding Guidebook for Follow-up Visit Packet, Form B7. Link to NACC Coding Guidebook Indicate the level of performance for each activity by checking the one appropriate response.

help_with.title: In the past four weeks, did the subject have difficulty or need help with:

fu_bills.title: 1. Writing checks, paying bills, or balancing a checkbook
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self

fu_taxes.title: 2. Assembling tax records, business affairs, or other papers
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self

fu_shopping.title: 3. Shopping alone for clothes, household necessities, or groceries
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self

fu_games.title: 4. Playing a game of skill such as bridge or chess, working on a hobby
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self

fu_stove.title: 5. Heating water, making a cup of coffee, turning off the stove
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self

fu_mealprep.title: 6. Preparing a balanced meal
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self

fu_events.title: 7. Keeping track of current events
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self

fu_payattn.title: 8. Paying attention to and understanding a TV program, book, or magazine
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self

fu_remdates.title: 9. Remembering appointments, family occasions, holidays, medications
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self

fu_travel.title: 10. Traveling out of the neighborhood, driving, or arranging to take public transportation
enum: 1 Has difficulty, but does by self
